website_summaries.verdict: The best type of air filter to choose if you own a Toyota or Lexus. Makes a good choice for Prius owners, who have more limited filter options.
pros: A fine filtration mesh catches small dust and particles that can wear down engine components over time
This helps to protect more finely-tuned engines often found in cars and hybrid vehicles
cons: Limited to specific Toyota models such as the Prius and RAV4

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2017 Toyota Prius
customer_reviews.text: Amazon/Seller says this will fit my wife's car which is a 2017 Toyota Prius. If you see my attached photo the stock engine air filter is on the right. Looks like I'll be getting a no hassle refund at least. Product quality looks fine and the price was right and since I'm getting an easy refund I'll give it 3 stars. Please update your info on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fits easily - Firestone wanted $35 to change this! Takes 15 seconds to install (look for a YouTube video) and this product fits perfectly. You will barely get your hands dirty doing this - unclip two clips, open a plastic box, remove old filter, install new filter, clip box back on. $25 saved!
customer_reviews.author: Bmore Raven

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2012 Prius perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a pink seal instead of black, nbd. Fit right in and installed in 20 secs. My only concern is that there's a large strip of what appears to be industrial-strength hot glue down the middle of the filter. Never seen that before on a filter, hence the 3 stars. Will update once I remove it, which may price difficult as I don't have a hair dryer, and I'm not sure how else to remove it without damaging the filter. May end up returning, not sure
customer_reviews.author: Vince G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Garage error for 2017 Prius
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this filter. However, Amazon Garage says this fits my 2017 Prius, so I ordered it. It is about twice the size and in no way fits this car. I stock my shelves with consumable parts so I can maintain the vehicle when needed. Now, I don't have the proper filter and I can't return since it's beyond the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 2018 RAV4 Hybrid perfectly, super easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 2018 RAV4 Hybrid perfectly. Simple install. MUCH better price than the $55 that the dealer wanted to charge even though our RAV is still under the extra warranty we purchased when we bought it. Still, I'll need to wait a bit before I add the final star. Takes a few months on our gravel road/driveway to really see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: iflogic

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job, but..
customer_reviews.text: It will filter the outside air, but I think when the chinese made this filter, and designed it, they minimized the necessary dimensions of everything composing the filter. IE, this is not a beefy filter, but it will work.. Next one I buy will be a Nippon Denso. They cost $20 and this chinese one is $8. I am willing to pay a little more for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Emily SB Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2011 Prius perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple minutes to change and fit perfectly. I don't see how the color of the rubber gasket would make any difference. A nice straight line of glue down the middle of the filter would seem intentional not a manufacturing mistake.
customer_reviews.author: todenbach

customer_reviews.title: Less pleats than OEM
customer_reviews.text: It's half the price as the OEM and it fits. However the OEM toyota denso engine air filter had 89 pleats and this ecogard one only has 73. Does that make it premium? Ehhhh
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Value DYI filter
customer_reviews.text: I changed the filter in less than two minutes in my 2013 Prius. Fits perfectly. Seems like a no-brainer to DIY. Not sure how much it will affect MPG, but that's not why I changed the filter. It was just time.
customer_reviews.author: MissBird

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my prius and averaged 55 mpg the ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my prius and averaged 55 mpg the next tank full. the previous tank was 50mpg with the same exact commute and driving style. definitely made an improvement over the last air filter that was due for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Kam

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to just buy a filter that isn't overpriced. Glad I could find one and DIY it myself rather than pay the Toyota dealer his inflated price and then labor on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: chuckmatthews

customer_reviews.title: wrong filter. poorly labeled
customer_reviews.text: i have a 2017 Prius III. the physical filter in the car is much smaller than this thing. From what mechanics tell me, the filter i actually received is for a 2016 they tell me this is a common mistake since toyota switched the filter designs.
customer_reviews.author: Burn0u7

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be exact replacements at a better price.
customer_reviews.text: Mileage? Well I hope it lasts for the recommended car mileage. It appears to be a perfect replacement for FRAM filters and others.
customer_reviews.author: garry a fritze

customer_reviews.title: It Seems to do a fine job
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do a fine job. Mine has a light color seal around it, unlike the picture. That works because I wrote my name on it with a sharpie. Now when I have my oil changed, it they show me some dirty filter they had lying around the shop, I'll know immediately it's not mine!
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Electronics

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my car
customer_reviews.text: By the time I attempted to install, the window for returning had closed. I was not aware there was a time limit--fooled me once, shame on you. Won't fool me twice.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: ECOGARD XA6114 Premium Engine Air Filter
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove, will buy it again next time I replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Harvey

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: easy to install as the size is the exactly the same as oem one and great value too. I haven't seen much of improvement in mileage though, I'm not expecting either.
customer_reviews.author: tkzvw30

customer_reviews.title: DIY facilitator
customer_reviews.text: Watch the tube video on how to do it, stay calm and confident, and take your wife to dinner with the savings over dealership price.
customer_reviews.author: James J. West

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in great shape. Good product. Easy to replace in car.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Filter!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just as described. Fit well, & was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bevo Caffè☕️

customer_reviews.title: Easy DIY Cost Savings
customer_reviews.text: So easy to replace thanks to YouTube. Same quality as the OEM filter. Saved $$
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This air filter is not designed for Toyota Prius
customer_reviews.text: My gas mileage went down by over 2 mpg on my Toyota Prius and engine was running roughly. I kept this air filter for a week installed on the car, then replaced with genuine toyota filter. Now engine performance and gas mileage are back to normal! This air filter is not designed for Toyota Prius.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sikdar

customer_reviews.title: Easy Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Why pay a service tech big bucks to change this filter when it only takes three minutes to change it? Easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Pastorasst

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you're looking and it works
customer_reviews.text: Good price and install took about 35 seconds.....not counting finding the key fob and opening the hood. Now the oil change folks don't have to keep showing me the dirty one they have laying around the shop every time I go in...
customer_reviews.author: sean stultz

customer_reviews.title: Engine Air Filter
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2012 Toyota Prius perfectly. If i have any issues i’ll update this. So far its all great super easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Abdiwahid Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, economical
customer_reviews.text: As good as the one the dealership wanted to charge four times more for!
customer_reviews.author: Rose B

customer_reviews.title: This does not fit a 2017 prius 3 even though ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit a 2017 prius 3 even though at the time of ordering the system said it does. I went to the store and bought the correct one to replace my old filter. The product number is VIX wa10000.
customer_reviews.author: van phu

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 2014 prius. Looks exactly like the Toyota branded denso filter it replaced. Took less than a minute to install with no tools. The dealer price for installation is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: mike purnell

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2011 prius
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Hard to evaluate it beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: On The Water

customer_reviews.title: Great product for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and was almost half the price as a shop would well it for.
customer_reviews.author: bop

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy money saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install saves me $30 bucks per oil change!
customer_reviews.author: Clarriezzel Pope

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good filter. Finally getting my mpg back. And my Toyota filter wasn't that dirty.
customer_reviews.author: AsWangs

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with our 2013 Prius
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with our 2013 Prius. Dealer was going to charge us $80 for this. Almost like Comp USA used to charge $300 to put in a CD-rom drive, 20 or so years ago.
customer_reviews.author: X. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Fit my car!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my car perfectly. Sometimes that doesn’t happen. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Laura Carothers

customer_reviews.title: The Filter
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two filters and they came at two different times which I thought was unusual. The part fit fine and now I have and extra one.
customer_reviews.author: rtjackucla

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a high quality filter equivalent to OEM ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a high quality filter equivalent to OEM. It was a little oddly packaged as it was sent "naked" inside the mailing box. No problem with this, just expected it to be in a plastic bag or it's own box. I would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Recklau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 2010 Toyota Prius
customer_reviews.text: Buying online save me a lot of money and it works the same as letting dealer do it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Bad description.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my car like it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Great filter, great price
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2014 Prius V. Great construction at fraction of cost for oem. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Jass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better price than you can find in any big box store. Fit my 2014 Prius just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KeithW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: direct drop in for 2014 prius. no issues as long as it performs as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just as well as the Toyota OEM filter.
customer_reviews.author: Surfman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you want your air filtered, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nigma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to install. It fit our 2010 Prius!
customer_reviews.author: dinosmongoose

customer_reviews.title: Fits and seems to work just like the one from Lexus.
customer_reviews.text: Fits and seems to work just like the one from Lexus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car because it's so much cheaper to do it yourself and not let Toyota charge for installation. My hubby did it without issue and it was quick and easy. I believe this brand will last long and do it's job. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Work grade in my car
customer_reviews.text: I replace my air filter every 15000 miles. These were great and just drop into place. So much less expensive than buying directly from the dealership
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gourmet

product_meta.title: ECOGARD XA6114 Premium Engine Air Filter Fits Lexus CT200h 1.8L HYBRID 2011-2017, NX300h 2.5L HYBRID 2015-2020 | Toyota Prius 1.8L HYBRID 2010-2015, Prius V 1.8L HYBRID 2012-2017
product_meta.description: ECOGARD XA6114 COMPATIBLE with 2010-2015 Toyota Prius, 2012-2017 Toyota Prius V, 2011-2017 Lexus CT200h, 2012-2015 Toyota Prius Plug-In, 2016 Toyota RAV4, 2015-2019 Lexus NX300h.
feature_bullets: COMPATIBLE with 2010-2015 Toyota Prius, 2012-2017 Toyota Prius V, 2011-2017 Lexus CT200h, 2012-2015 Toyota Prius Plug-In, 2016 Toyota RAV4, 2015-2019 Lexus NX300h.
A clean air filter improves air flow and prevents dirt and dust from entering the engine
Follow recommended change intervals as noted in your vehicle owner's manual
Designed to enhance the installer's experience
All products tested for OE fit, form and function, ensure fit using our E-Catalog
